700670f-a.title: Bronx: Bronxwood Avenue - 224th Street (East)
700670f-a.text:
Bronxwood Ave., north from but not including East 224th Street,
showing the thoroughfare being repaved by the W.P.A.
September 2, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
Neg. R15451
